title: Bitcoin ($BTC) Whales Withdraw Over $1 Billion from Coinbase, Fueling Speculation
description: Bitcoin holdings on Nasdaq-listed cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase, the largest crypto trading platform in the United States, have fallen to their lowest level since 2017 as BTC whales started withdrawing funds into self-custody. According to data from CryptoQuant whales – investors holding large amounts of Bitcoin – have withdrawn over $1 billion worth of the cryptocurrency […]
